title: 1 HOUR PURE EPICNESS MIX - EPIC MUSIC 2013/2014 | Part 1 of 3
description: It was a great year 2013 we hit 10.000 subscribers! i plan to continue my mixes like i always do until YouTube will stop me, so yes here we go again Part 1 of 482310984534 and by the way happy xmas & a happy new year.
